gamelist:
./Planetarian.sh Planetarian Planetarian is a visual novel set in a post-apocalyptic world where a lone survivor encounters a malfunctioning robot attendant named Yumemi Hoshino in an abandoned planetarium. Through their interactions, themes of hope, humanity, and the enduring power of memories are explored. ./planetarian/cover.png 20041129T000000 Key VisualArts
</gamelist
